title: Curecanti National Recreation Area: Ponderosa
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping     Ponderosa                Ponderosa Campground       Ponderosa Campground is located at the northwest end of the Soap Creek Arm of Blue Mesa Reservoir. From U.S. Highway 50, follow CO Highway 92 1/2 mile past Blue Mesa Dam to Soap Creek Road. Proceed 7 miles north on the gravel Soap Creek Road.  Tents and medium sized RVs can be accommodated at Ponderosa. All sites are first-come first-served. Note: During dry conditions, the first 7 miles of Soap Creek Road are passable to trailers and RVs. Rain can make the Soap Creek Road hazardous or impassable.
